title: Creating a Common Denominator
text: We can create fractions with a common denominator by finding the LCD, which is $$84x^2 y^2$$
speech: We can create fractions with a common denominator by finding the LCD, which is , 84 x squared y squared
pacedSpeech: We can create fractions with a common denominator by finding the LCD, which is  , 84 x squared y squared

title: Rewriting Each Fraction
text: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get $$\frac{35y}{84x^2 y^2}+\frac{16x}{84x^2 y^2}$$
speech: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get  fraction, 35 y, over, 84 x squared y squared,  plus fraction, 16 x, over, 84 x squared y squared,
pacedSpeech: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get   fraction, 35 y, over, 84 x squared y squared,  plus fraction, 16 x, over, 84 x squared y squared,

title: Adding the Fractions
text: Adding the fractions we get $$\frac{16x+35y}{84x^2 y^2}$$
speech: Adding the fractions we get  fraction, 16 x plus 35 y, over, 84 x squared y squared,
